name: Pocket League (vmlobo, wolvermeme)
description:
This game is a submission for the Mix and Game Jam 2019

Fullscreen is recommended

A windows build of the game is also availiable below

Controls: 

Player1:[w,a,s,d,lshift]

Player2:[arrow keys,np0,rshift]

Credits:

-João Vidal (sound)

-João Amante (programming)

-Vitor Lobo (programming)

The project is also availiable on GitHub:

https://github.com/vmlobo/PocketLeague
